attributes.action: Reduce Tuition Fees during COVID-19 Pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
Inadequate teaching provided by universities, with less contact hours than expected and lower quality.

Exam guidance has been vague; we're expected to do exams with barely any information and with same grade boundaries as in normal circumstances

In some cases there have been inconsistencies in marking and no re-marks

Increasing pressure on already underfunded wellbeing services

Students still expected to pay full loan
attributes.background: The government should substantially reduce tuition fees which are currently at £9250/year, accounting for the lack of education experienced by university students across the UK.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762
